questions.question: Which of the following is the duty of front office manager?

choices.answer: Helping guests make reservations at hotels in other cities
Notify the security department of the spotted undesirable individual around
Arranging theater tickets for the hotel guest.

choices.answer: it is required by the government
to determine the strategies needed for the businesses to succeed
to make the business stand out from other businesses

questions.question: Why is it necessary for the business owner to know about the business environment of his business venture?

choices.answer: To identify the Streghts of the Business
To identify the factors that affect the functioning of a business venture.
To identify the Weaknesses of the Business
To identify the Opportunities of the Business.

Which of the following statements is true about cleaning tools and equipment?

choices.answer: The staff does not need training to do it.
Dirt and dust are signs of optimal use of tools and equipment.
Damp cloth is always advisable to be used.
It must be done with a schedule.

questions.question: Which of the following ways is the best way to clean tools and equipment?

choices.answer: Damp cloth is always advisable to be used.
Soak the electronic tools and equipment in boiling water and sanitizing age
Remove visible dirt without damaging the parts of the item.
Dirt and dust are signs of optimal use of tools and equipment.

questions.question: You were asked to remove a damaged part of the copier. What is the first thing that you should do?

choices.answer: Open the machine by taking out the parts.
